feed.title: Pi-hole Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.16.2
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.16.1...v5.16.2

What's Changed

  • Fix for gravity's unchecked resource consumption. by @dschaper in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5234
  • Hotfix Core v5.16.2 by @dschaper in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5235

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.16.1...v5.16.2

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow TLD blocking using ABP style by @rdwebdesign in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5240
  • Remove special handling of pgl.yoyo.org by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5249
  • Add Fedora 38 to the test suite by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5257
  • Filter ABP CSS selectors by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5247
  • Don't use '--suffix' in mktemp by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5272
  • Remove unused code from query.sh by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5266
  • Don't source the install script in webpage.sh by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5270
  • Remove forgotten variables by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5273
  • Fix issue with Adding Local DNS Records does not add to /etc/pihole/custom.list when using grep 3.10 by @MrDuck2742 in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5269
  • Use list parsing functionality of FTL by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5275
  • remove outdated comments by @ipitio in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5227
  • Add Ubuntu 23 to test suite by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5284
  • Add support for RISC-V 64-bit installs by @MichaIng in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5196

New Contributors

  • @MrDuck2742 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5269
  • @ipitio made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5227

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.16.2...v5.17

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix Faulty Regex pattern in custom DNS domain validation by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5291
  • Fix gravity adlist status not being updated by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5294

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.17...v5.17.1

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.17.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add tests for Debian 12 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5312
  • Ignore ABP style entries in debug log dig test by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5381
  • Remove fake user agent when downloading adlists by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5366
  • Fix spellcheck errors by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5410
  • Yu vs uh by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5411
  • Update references to web repo by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5418
  • v5.17.2 by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5421

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.17.1...v5.17.2

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.17.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add "-ni" to all sqlite3 invocations (v5) by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5519

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.17.2...v5.17.3
